trans-unit.source: Represents a single touch input produced by a finger on a touchscreen.
trans-unit.target: Representa um único toque entrada produzida por um dedo em uma tela sensível ao toque.

trans-unit.source: You typically access a TouchDevice by using the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchEventArgs.TouchDevice%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Geralmente, você acessa um TouchDevice usando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchEventArgs.TouchDevice%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchEventArgs.TouchDevice%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A TouchDevice represents a single touch on a screen.
trans-unit.target: Um TouchDevice representa um único toque em uma tela.

trans-unit.source: If multiple touches are present, use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Id%2A> property to distinguish between them.
trans-unit.target: Se houver vários ajustes, use o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Id%2A>propriedade para diferenciá-los.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This class contains an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa classe contém uma demanda de herança no nível de classe que se aplica a todos os membros.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when the derived class does not have full-trust permission.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Security.SecurityException>é gerada quando a classe derivada não tem permissão de confiança total.</xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: For more information about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as exigências de segurança, consulte [demandas de Link](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [demandas de herança](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).

trans-unit.source: Called from constructors in derived classes to initialize the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Chamado a partir de construtores em classes derivadas para inicializar o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier for the touch device.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador exclusivo para o dispositivo de toque.

trans-unit.source: Adds the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref> to the input messaging system.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref> para a sistema de mensagens de entrada.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> should call this method to activate the current device.
trans-unit.target: Classes que herdam de <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>devem chamar este método para ativar o dispositivo atual.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: The device is already activated.
trans-unit.target: O dispositivo já está ativado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref> is added to the input messaging system.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref> é adicionado à entrada de sistema de mensagens.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref> that is reporting input for this device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref> que está relatando a entrada para este dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: The source that is reporting input for this device.
trans-unit.target: A fonte que está relatando a entrada para este dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: Captures a touch to the specified element by using the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode"></xref> capture mode.
trans-unit.target: Captura um toque para o elemento especificado usando o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode"> </xref> modo de captura.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> cannot be captured to an element if it is already captured to another element.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>não podem ser capturadas para um elemento se ele já é capturado para outro elemento.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: The element that captures the touch input.
trans-unit.target: O elemento que captura o entrada por toque.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element was able to capture the touch; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento foi capaz de capturar o toque; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: element is not a , , or .
trans-unit.target: elementis not a , , or .

trans-unit.source: Captures a touch to the specified element by using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Captura um toque para o elemento especificado usando especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> cannot be captured to an element if it is already captured to another element.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>não podem ser capturadas para um elemento se ele já é capturado para outro elemento.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: The element that captures the touch.
trans-unit.target: O elemento que captura o toque.

trans-unit.source: The capture policy to use.
trans-unit.target: A política de captura a ser usado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element was able to capture the touch; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento foi capaz de capturar o toque; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: element is not a , , or .
trans-unit.target: elementis not a , , or .

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that captured the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o elemento que capturou o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The element that captured the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O elemento que capturou o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the capture policy of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a política de captura do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The capture policy of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A política de captura do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref> from the input messaging system.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref> da entrada de sistema de mensagens.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> should call this method to deactivate the current device.
trans-unit.target: Classes que herdam de <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>devem chamar este método para desativar o dispositivo atual.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchLeave> event is raised without the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp> event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchLeave>sem correspondente é gerado <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp>evento.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchLeave>

trans-unit.source: The device is not activated.
trans-unit.target: O dispositivo não está ativado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref> is removed from the input messaging system.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref> é removido da entrada de sistema de mensagens.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that the touch contact point is directly over.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o elemento que é o ponto de contato de toque diretamente pela.

trans-unit.source: The element that the touch contact point is directly over.
trans-unit.target: O elemento que é o ponto de contato de toque diretamente pela.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns all touch points that are collected between the most recent and previous touch events.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, retorna eventos de toque de todos os pontos de toque que são coletados entre os mais recentes e anteriores.

trans-unit.source: The element that defines the coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: O elemento que define o espaço de coordenadas.

trans-unit.source: All touch points that were collected between the most recent and previous touch events.
trans-unit.target: Eventos de toque de todos os pontos de toque que foram coletados entre os mais recentes e anteriores.

trans-unit.source: Returns the current position of the touch device relative to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a posição atual do dispositivo toque em relação ao elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The element that defines the coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: O elemento que define o espaço de coordenadas.

trans-unit.source: The current position of the touch device relative to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: A posição atual do dispositivo toque em relação ao elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique identifier of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>, as provided by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o identificador exclusivo do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>, conforme fornecido pelo sistema operacional.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> represents a single touch on a screen.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>representa um único toque em uma tela.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: If multiple touches are present, use the Id property to distinguish between them.
trans-unit.target: Se houver vários ajustes, use a propriedade Id para diferenciá-los.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O identificador exclusivo do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the device is active.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o dispositivo está ativo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the device is active; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o dispositivo estiver ativo; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when a touch is captured to an element.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando um toque é capturado para um elemento.

trans-unit.source: The OnCapture method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: O método OnCapture não tem nenhuma implementação padrão.

trans-unit.source: It can be overridden in a derived class to perform any actions that are required when the touch input is captured.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser substituído em uma classe derivada para executar as ações que são necessárias quando a entrada de toque é capturada.

trans-unit.source: The element that captures the touch input.
trans-unit.target: O elemento que captura o entrada por toque.

trans-unit.source: The capture policy.
trans-unit.target: A política de captura.

trans-unit.source: Called when a manipulation has ended.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando uma manipulação terminou.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to cancel the action; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para cancelar a ação; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when a manipulation is started.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando uma manipulação é iniciada.

trans-unit.source: The OnManipulationStarted method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: O método OnManipulationStarted não tem nenhuma implementação padrão.

trans-unit.source: It can be overridden in a derived class to perform any actions that are required when touch manipulation is started.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser substituído em uma classe derivada para executar as ações que são necessárias para a manipulação de toque é iniciada.

trans-unit.source: Reports that a touch is pressed on an element.
trans-unit.target: Informa que um toque é pressionado em um elemento.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> should call this method to raise the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown> event.
trans-unit.target: Classes que herdam de <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>devem chamar este método para gerar o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown>evento.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchEnter> event is raised before the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown> event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchEnter>é gerado antes do <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown>evento.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchEnter>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown"></xref> event was handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown"> </xref> evento foi tratada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Reports that a touch is moving across an element.
trans-unit.target: Relata um toque é movido em um elemento.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> should call this method to raise the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove> event.
trans-unit.target: Classes que herdam de <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>devem chamar este método para gerar o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove>evento.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove"></xref> event was handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove"> </xref> evento foi tratada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Reports that a touch was lifted from an element.
trans-unit.target: Informa que um toque foi eliminado de um elemento.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> should call this method to raise the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp> event.
trans-unit.target: Classes que herdam de <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>devem chamar este método para gerar o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp>evento.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchLeave> event is raised after the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp> event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchLeave>é gerado após o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp>evento.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchLeave>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp"></xref> event was handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp"> </xref> evento foi tratada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref> that is reporting input for this device.
trans-unit.target: Conjuntos de <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref> que está relatando a entrada para este dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: The source that reports input for this device.
trans-unit.target: A fonte que informa a entrada para este dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref> to synchronize the user interface with underlying touch points.
trans-unit.target: Força o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref> para sincronizar a interface do usuário com base os pontos de contato.

trans-unit.source: Synchronizing the user interface with the underlying touch positions might cause <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove> events to be raised.
trans-unit.target: Sincronizando a interface do usuário com as posições de toque subjacente pode causar <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove>eventos a serem gerados.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove>

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.IManipulator"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a posição do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.IManipulator"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>instância é convertida em um <xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator>interface.</xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: The element to use as the frame of reference for calculating the position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.IManipulator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O elemento a ser usado como o quadro de referência para calcular a posição do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.IManipulator"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.IManipulator"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A posição do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.IManipulator"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique identifier of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref> as provided by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o identificador exclusivo do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref> conforme fornecido pelo sistema operacional.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>instância é convertida em um <xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator>interface.</xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O identificador exclusivo do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a manipulation has ended.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma manipulação terminou.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>instância é convertida em um <xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator>interface.</xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to cancel the action; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para cancelar a ação; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that receives input from the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o elemento que recebe entrada do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The element that receives input from the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O elemento que recebe entrada do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a touch message is sent.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma mensagem de toque é enviada.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
